# tkdm

`kdm9`'s toolkit of miscellaneous goodies


# `tkdm autogallery`

Automatically generate an HTML lightbox + gallery from a directory of images.

```
$ tree images
images/
    a/
        img1.jpg
        img2.jpg
    b/
        img3.jpg
        img4.jpg
$ tkdm autogallery -i ./images -o ./webgallery/ -t 8
```
